+++ SUMMARY

  * Should be based upon OSEObjectDeviceTemplate

  ? We should probably get certified by [ObjectEntityOrganizationInstanceOSHWA]?
  * Revisions should probably be maintained?
  
  * Specific [instantiation] of a device as designed,maintained by [OSE]
    * Example: OSEObjectDevicePrintedCircuitBoard is documentation on how to create a ObjectDevicePrintedCircuitBoard
  
  * The ultimate goal is the ability to build any object recursivlely from all OSEObject components
    * example: you are able to build an OSEObjectDeviceAutomobile completely from other OSEObjects, OSEObjectDevices, OSEObjectMaterial(s) 
    * When an ingredient has no OSE documentation, meaning the user can not make it:
      * The best alternative is to provide the least evil, most open source place to buy it. 
  
  
  * Infinite iterations should be maintainable
    * This may get tricky. 
      * OSEProblemOfInfiniteIterations
       *   



+++ CAD / CAM / SOFTWARE
  * Objects such as "black box" electronics or even physical objects will require files and software to create said files.
    * KiCAD will be used for creating electrical schematics and PCB files
    * FreeCAD will be used to make 3D models and export STEP/STL files for physical enclosures.  
      * https://hackaday.com/2020/07/07/designing-3d-printed-enclosures-for-kicad-pcbs/
